name: Block Puzzle - Fun Games
description:
This is a fun and simple puzzle jewel puzzle game that combines jigsaw and tetris in one. The game is simple to control and for the most important point is, once you play it, you will love it instantly.
Challenging block-filling game with brain teasers can sharpen your mind and improve your logical thinking ability, while relieving you the stress of life also making you feel happy.

This game has cool gem squares, simple operation page and smooth elimination effect.

How to play：
1. Drag the jewel squares into the 9x9 grid.
2.Fill up a row, column or grid to eliminate jewel.
3.Eliminate more than one row, column or 3x3 squares at a time and you can get more points.
4.When you come across unsuitable jewels, you can put them in the storage grid.
5.The game is over when there is no more space to fill the jewels.

How to challenge the high score?
1. Observe the shape of the jewel and plan how to put them into the 9x9 squares
2.Try to eliminate more than one row, column or square at a time to free up more space
3.Use the storage compartments wisely and try to avoid forcing in unsuitable jewel squares.
4. More practice will make you perfect!

This classic jewel block puzzle game is completely free and you can start or finish the game at any time and any place.
Featuring smooth jewel crushing effects, you can feel the excitement of crushing gems. Cube Puzzle will help you reduce your fatigue, have fun all the time and enjoy our wonderful gaming experience.
